Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by many of our customers due to its exceptional quality and functionality. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its value and benefits, I am offering it to you for $130. This is a special offer tailored just for you, taking into account its worth to you personally. I hope you find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $130. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $130
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
